title: Andrew Morton: "Meghan: A Hollywood Princess"
description: Michael talks with Andrew Morton, on his book "Meghan: A Hollywood Princess." Morton is also the author of the bestselling book "Diana: Her True Story." Original air date 20 April 2018. The book was published on 17 April 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi, Andrew Morton)
